msContents.summary: Small manuscript for use in public or private meditation and prayer. Dedicated to praising the importance of the well-known Hindu work the Bhagavadgītā as a sacred work and expounding on the merits of its recitation, comparing it to visiting various sacred pilgrimage sites (tīrtha). Presented as a dialogue between the wild boar form of Viṣṇu called Varāha and the goddess earth, Pṛthivī. Ends with Vedic mantras.
